resources.string: press the pencil icon to update
When you delete your ConnectUs account, you wont be able to retrieve the content or information you have shared with others and your account will be deleted permanently

ConnectUs app is a social bases app which is used to make communication easy among the users. It makes the relation more strong and brings all together to more close. Whatever this app is in the develop stage, there is a long journey to complete the whole application.
